```{r setup}
library(vaccine.equity)
```

```{r}
for (i in 1:100) {
  portion <- i / 100
  ret <- getFinalSize(vacTime = 0,
    vacPortion = c(0.2, portion * 0.4),
    popSize = c(80000, 20000),
    R0 = 1.75,
    recoveryRate = 1 / 7,
    contactRatio = 1.7,
    contactWithinGroup = c(0.2, 0.5),
    suscRatio = 1)
  print(portion)
  print(portion * 0.4)
  print(ret)
}
```
